actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS
  SET   CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE = {{vaychkboxrelatedIndividual.selectedValues}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TYPE  = {{vayIndDesignation.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_OTHERS_INFO = {{vayDesignationOthers.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PARTNER_PERC = {{vaypartnerperct.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_FIRSTNAME = {{vayFname.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MIDDLENAME = {{vayMName.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_LASTNAME = {{vayLname.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MFSTYPE  = {{vayselMFSName.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MFSNAME = {{vayMFSname.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DOB = {{moment(vayIndDOB.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TAX_ID  = {{vayPANTAN.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_NATIONALITY = {{vayIndNationality.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_RES_TAX_PURPOSE = {{vayIndTaxResidency.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PASSPORT_NO = {{vayPassportNo.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DIN_DPIN  = {{vayDinDpin.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE1  = {{vayIndAddrLin1.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE2  = {{vayIndAddrLin2.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_CITY  = {{vayIndCityLocality.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_DISTRICT  = {{vayIndCityDistrict.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_STATE  = {{vayIndStateCountry.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_COUNTRY = {{vayIndCountrySelec.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_ZIP = {{vayPincode.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MOBILE  = {{vayIndMobile.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_EMAIL   = {{vayIndEmail.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GENDER= 		{{vaySelGender.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GOVT_ID ={{vayGovtIssueId.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_HOLD_PERC={{vayOwnershipPerct.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_IS_POLITICALEXPOPER=	{{vayIsPolitical.isChecked}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_IS_MINOR =	{{vayisMinor.isChecked}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GUARDIAN_NAME={{vayGuardianName.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GUARDIAN_RELATIONSHIP=	{{vayGuardRel.text}},
	CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_CKYCNO={{vayIndCKYCNO.text}}
WHERE OID = {{appsmith.store.editKeyPersonOID}}
AND CUSTOMER_OID = '1';
